fact: Current Wenberg OTR drivers have brought over 100 years of driving experience to the company.
John Lloyd was always partial to International Trucks, starting with the 2KB6 models he bought in 1948. John Sigurd has carried on that tradition.
A one way trip to Minneapolis from International Falls in 1960 took 8 hours in the truck with a top speed of 50 mph.
